resources.string: Complete the following phrase with the correct pronoum:\n\nTeacher, please, can you tell I/me if my/mine project is correct?
Choose the option with the CORRECT answer for the following question:\n\nWhen does the recruitment supervisor decide to change the schedule?
The recruitment supervisor decides to change schedule this week
The recruitment supervisor decide to change schedule this week
The recruitment supervisor decided to change schedule this week
Choose the option with the correct Wh words sequence:\n\n____________ is the reception desk? The reception desk is at the first floor.
Choose the option with the correct short answer:\n\nWere the investors aware about the contract rules?
Vocabulary exercise: Match the words and meanings:\n\nAn organization that sells goods or services in order to make money.

Siemens, IBM and Red Hat today ____________ a new collaboration that will ____________ a hybrid cloud ____________ to ____________ an open, flexible and more secure solution for manufacturers and plant operators to ____________ real-time value from operational data.\n\nChoose the sentence with the correct verb sequence:

MindSphere already ____________ customers with data-driven insights to strengthen operations through Industrial IoT. Through our work with IBM and Red Hat, we can now ____________ customers the flexibility to ____________ to ____________ MindSphere on-premise or in the cloud to best meet their distinct operational needs and become more efficient.\n\nChoose the sentence with the correct verb sequence:
Let we/us explain the scenario to he/him.\n\nComplete with the correct pronoum:
Choose the option with the correct Wh words sequence:\n\n____________ was the supervisor on duty yesterday? Mr. Simon was the supervisor on duty yesterday.
